text: Jwalakwe ni Ajula jwaakumpanjilaga kaoneche kenu n'di n’nyitumbo yaakutiji pakusaka (kuti m'be ŵalume kapena ŵakongwe, ŵaswela kapena ŵapiliu, ŵalewu kapena ŵajipi, ŵakwimbala kapena ŵachilenje). Pangali nnungu jwine (jwakuŵajilwa kun'galagatila) ikaŵeje Jwelepejo, Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwalunda lwakusokoka
